statements: DELETE FROM geospatial_renewable_energy_sites WHERE site_name = 'Solar Park A';
DELETE FROM geospatial_renewable_energy_sites WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND solar_potential = 'High';
DELETE FROM renewable_energy_sources WHERE site_name = 'Wind Farm Alpha';
DELETE FROM solar_farms WHERE capacity > 1000 AND status = 'Active';
DELETE FROM PowerOutput WHERE site_id = 10 AND power_generated > 500;
DELETE FROM energy_production WHERE id = 1 AND site_id = 1;
DELETE FROM power_consumption WHERE site_id = 2 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
